Ken,

   Unfortunately I have no time to publish many of the experiment and=

research I do, although I'd like to do something about that if I were
rese=
arching in University.
 At the moment, in the market jungle, I have been ab=
le to patent an
application of neuroevolution (nor the software neither the=
 algorithm,
only hardware) and to extend the neuroevolution   beyond   NEAT=
. It is
not NEAT, the only useful feature I am using of NEAT is the history=

marks.  This new technology let me simulate 30 millions on neurons per
sec=
ond in a standard PC!!!! The main application where I have used
this techno=
logy is in Artificial Vision. I have solved a problem for
the automotive se=
ctor where it is the only solution in the world. Now,
I am researching a ne=
w problem I hope to beat soon (electronic
component sector). 

LSTM was a s=
tep in this technology, although I don't use it, however
it showed me the i=
mportance to have a structured temporal memory in a
neuronal network.

Rega=
rds

Germ=E1n Bravo.
